author: Austin Evans
description:
Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@austintechtips
Instagram: https://instagram.com/austinnotduncan
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@austinnotduncan

In this deep dive, I explore how the PlayStation 4 became one of gaming's greatest success stories, despite being Sony's "least ambitious" console. From the disastrous PS3 era to the legendary E3 2013 showdown with Xbox, I break down how Sony's more practical approach led to over 117 million PS4s sold worldwide. Get ready for the fascinating story of how playing it safe revolutionized console gaming forever.

Chapter Titles:
0:00 Intro 
0:50 The PS3 (almost) Disaster
2:48 Passing the Torch
4:00 Powerful Enough…?
6:29 What a DualShock
8:23 E3 2013
12:10 Launch
14:16 The Generation in a Nutshell
15:34 Pro and VR
19:53 Legacy
title: I bought EVERY PlayStation 4
